commit message: SSL connection, landscape mode fix, ui optimisation

Removed unnecessary <@Override>
Added Toggle Limit Speed <experimental not working>
Fixed missing class and layout of server settings
introduced the action bar (Android 3 and later)
enabled action bar's home button for navigating up
Share links directly from Chrome/YouTube/etc into pyLoad
removed menu options 'toggle', click status icons in overview tab instead
centered and increased text size of 'empty list text'
removed account tab, showing account data in a dialog via menu option
removed settings tab, showing remote settings in a different activity via menu option
Android Lint: removed hardcoded '/sdcard/', replaced deprecated layout param FILL_PARENT
fixed synchronization of non-final field tasks
same menu resource for all versions (using MenuItemCompat and version dependent drawables)
catch error when non clicking non existent files
also catch error when accessing non existing packages
correct intent filter for DLC files
few pixel margin for the logo
fixed proguard notes, added mapping for 0.3.0 release
fixed proguard to keep base64 codec
make captcha input field not suggest words from dictionaries
add 'Restart failed files' option to menu
Sort files in packages by their order attribute
